<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the instruction has a type argument for operand 1, and defines an ID</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// output register in operand 0 If so, we need to swap operands 0 and 1 so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type comes first in the output, despide coming second in the MCInst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="#a69f8a6a325901e0745c40c9f13c1a77d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a69f8a6a325901e0745c40c9f13c1a77d">hasType</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo">MCInstrInfo</a> &amp;MII) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;MCDesc = MII.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo/#a176ca2c9108a997dcfd8aadf4c0f0fa0">get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we define an output, and have at least one other argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a3496944fcc473dfe584e6615503a7a76">getNumDefs</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp; MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0ca904e64ee29c8812ed34e632d3c947">getNumOperands</a>() &gt;= 2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we define an ID, and take a type as operand 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;0&#93;.RegClass &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">           MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;1&#93;.RegClass &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">           MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;0&#93;.RegClass != SPIRV::TYPERegClassID &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">           MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;1&#93;.RegClass == SPIRV::TYPERegClassID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76" lineLink="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87">emitOperand</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;CB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isReg()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the id index starting at 1 (0 is an invalid index).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#add1f2d1d972957d22186f4ec92f985f6">support::endian::write&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#a4df23dddc646b6a4b36ff483063a4ff8">Register::virtReg2Index</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getReg()) + 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isImm()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#add1f2d1d972957d22186f4ec92f985f6">support::endian::write</a>(CB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getImm()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected operand type in VReg&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the type in operand 1 before the ID in operand 0 it defines, and all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remaining operands in the order they come naturally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="#a68b9d0a1825fd74bce64b7ea7beb0d42"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a68b9d0a1825fd74bce64b7ea7beb0d42">emitTypedInstrOperands</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;CB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87">emitOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(1), CB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 2; i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a>; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87">emitOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(i), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit operands in the order they come naturally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="#a151b07ea07c6ad8fe6914b90153f2c55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a151b07ea07c6ad8fe6914b90153f2c55">emitUntypedInstrOperands</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;CB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87">emitOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-spirvmccodeemitter-cpp-/spirvmccodeemitter/#ad0a9e447125532de0cf38be1cf3cc337"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-spirvmccodeemitter-cpp-/spirvmccodeemitter/#ad0a9e447125532de0cf38be1cf3cc337">SPIRVMCCodeEmitter::encodeInstruction</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;CB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MCFixup&gt;</a> &amp;Fixups,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the first 32 SPIR-V bytes with the number of args and the opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t OpCode = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-spirvmccodeemitter-cpp-/spirvmccodeemitter/#aec14628a745202196b06e6affe187059">getBinaryCodeForInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, Fixups, STI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t NumWords = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands() + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t FirstWord = (NumWords &lt;&lt; 16) | OpCode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#add1f2d1d972957d22186f4ec92f985f6">support::endian::write</a>(CB, FirstWord, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the instruction arguments (emitting the output type first if present).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a69f8a6a325901e0745c40c9f13c1a77d">hasType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, MCII))</span></CodeLine>
